text: Dominique Lavanant (born 24 May 1944) is a César Award-winning French actress, director and screenwriter. She is known for her comedy skills. She was born in Morlaix, Finistère, France. She is known for her roles in Papy fait de la résistance, La boum, Three Men and a Cradle, Les bronzés font du ski and Inspecteur la Bavure (alongside Gérard Depardieu). ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:French comedians Category:French movie directors Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French voice actors Category:French stage actors
title: Dominique Lavanant
